h02_secondary_hero.subtitle: Discover events and entertainment in our capital
h02_secondary_hero.title: Welcome to Riyadh Season

c02_title_intro.introDescription: Imagine if your world has shifted, imagine it a theatre playing 100 plays and more. Imagine the most outstanding expos, arts and concerts from around the world. Imagine Saudi authentic heritage and finest local & international food. Imagine and go beyond your imagination. See you in Riyadh!

item0.description: This peculiar exhibition will surely turn your world upside down. Literally. The exhibit will take you to a different world, in which everything will be flipped upside down, creating a reality-shifting experience.
item0.title: Upside Down

jcr:content.jcr:title: Winter at Tantora
jcr:content.pageTitle: Winter at Tantora - Visit Saudi Official Website

c02_title_intro.introDescription: Winter at Tantora offers a variety of diverse experiences to match every interest. The festival runs each weekend from 19 December 2019 until 7 March 2020. Festival-goers will have the opportunity to participate in a range of unique events and experiences, from visiting spectacular historic sites to hearing world-class musical performances to soaring above the landscape in a hot air balloon or vintage aircraft.

item0.description: From world-famous international legends such as Enrique Iglesias and bands like Jamiroquai to regional maestros such as Omar Khairat, an exciting line-up of musical talents will surely light up the stage. Adventure seekers will be thrilled by the amazing range of cultural and culinary experiences and exhilarating activities such as hot air balloon rides and 4x4 tours.
item0.title: Winter at Tantora

image.alt: Man riding a horse and plays polo

item1.description: Explore the first-ever contemporary art exhibition in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The expo will introduce visitors to desert civilizations, and it is also seen as a dialogue among cultures, with the participation of artists from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and neighbouring countries. Local artists drew their inspiration from the scenic features of nature and from the fragrant history of the Al-Ula region.
item1.title: Desert X AlUla

item2.description: Take a guided tour of the stars. Gaze up into the night sky, far away from the lights of the city. Accompanied by a local expert, you can learn about celestial objects and enjoy the peace and solitude of this awe-inspiring experience. Make a wish for every shooting star you spot.
item2.title: Stargazing

image.alt: Milky way above Saudi Arabia's desert

item3.description: Standing over 1200 m above sea level the Harrat is a formidable landmark here in AlUla, with stunning views over the region. Once at the top of the Harrat, the experienced Adventure Zipline Team will prepare you for an experience of a lifetime: You will fly at over 90 km per hour to reach the landing in approximately 42 seconds. Adrenaline rush guaranteed!
item3.title: Winter at Tantora Zipline Adventure

item4.description: Azimuth Festival is a three-day festival of music, art, and gastronomy. It is a gathering of Eastern and Western minds, brought together in a remote and ancient meeting place â€“ now a UNESCO World Heritage Site â€“ to showcase and celebrate creativity at its best. This event will mark the end of the Winter at Tantora festival.
item4.title: Azimuth Festival

item5.description: A 20-minute flight that takes the visitor into a journey through time to explore the natural beauty of AlUla. Visitors will enjoy the spectacular scenery of the landscape of AlUla and have a chance to see a UNESCO heritage site from the top.
item5.title: Fly Through Time

jcr:content.jcr:title: Taif Season
jcr:content.pageTitle: Taif Season - Visit Saudi Official Website

c02_title_intro.introDescription:
A welcoming scent of roses from the city of roses, in its exceptional season, bringing you a whole month of excitement, fun and enthusiasm. Taif with its cultural authenticity, artistic heritage, and charming atmosphere is ready to welcome you.

Join us in Taif season with Souk Okaz, Camel Festival, Roses Village, and Land Masters to enrich your experience with numerous exceptional activities, art events, entertainment and exciting competitions, which we bring you in an authentic Arab ambiance. Save the date for nature, fun and art like you have never experienced before!

Taif season brings you a unique experience where culture, heritage and art meet nature and adventure in an ambiance full of excitement and entertainment.
